full_summary:
**1500 MHz Radio Frequency Filter Kit**
==========================

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01029877
**Title.***: Trousse de filtre radiofréquence 1500 MHz

**Notice Details**

* **Notice URL:** Not available
* **Advertisement Date:** March 13, 2023
* **Closing Date:** April 24, 2023 at 14:00:00

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Name:** 1500 MHz Radio Frequency Filter Kit
* **Estimated Service Period:** Estimated quantity of 71, and duration of contract: from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024
* **Place of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Solicitation Details**

* **Category of Requirement:** *GD
* **Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Limited Tendering
* **Written Statement of Requirements:** Available
* **Presentations and Evaluation Procedure:** Evaluation will be conducted on a Mandatory Requirements and Rated Requirements.

**Commercial and Trade Agreements**

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Key Contact**

* John Villeneuve
* john.villeneuve@ised-ised.gc.ca
* 343-571-6760



Please note, I made changes in formatting, punctuation, and grammar to make your entry more professional-looking. I left out some redundant information that may be irrelevant. If you want more information to be included, please let me know.
